qualification:
Saat ini kami sedang membutuhkan 100 orang promotor tukar tambah handphone untuk penempatan di Jakarta Selatan dan Depok

Persyaratan :

  1. Pria / Wanita
  2. Good looking dan berpenampilan menarik
  3. Usia max 27 tahun untuk wanita dan 30 tahun untuk pria
  4. Pendidikan min SMK / sederajat
  5. Berpengalaman / non pengalaman
  6. Aktif, komunikatif, dan disiplin
  7. Bisa bekerja dengan target

Bagi yang berminat bergabung diperusahaan kami kirimkan CV anda dan apply sekarang juga !

• Wanita
  • Min SMU / D1
  • Pengalaman min 2 thn
  • good looking, good sales skill, good attitude

• Hold minimum high school degree or equivalent with a year of experience as Production Assistant is required.
  • Creative in camera framing
  • Must be able to work on a team
  • Have a good understanding on production and post-production workflow
  • Have a good understanding on camera set-up (aperture, focus, speed, iso, etc.)
  • Possess understanding how to operate Adobe After Effects is a plus

Jenis Kelamin  :  Wanita / Pria

Usia               :  Max 35 Tahun

Kemampuan   :  Bahasa Jepang Lisan & Tulisan ( Harus )

                        Bahasa Inggris Aktif

                        Komunikatif

                        Bisa Mengoperasikan Komputer ( Ms. Office )

                        Mempunyai SIM A ( Nilai Lebih )

• Must have minimum 4 years of Plastic Injection Molding Design
  • Must have experience in modification of Plastic Injection Molds
  • Experience in troubleshooting molding, injection, and blow problems
  • Minimum D3 / S1 Mechanical Engineering or relevant discipline
  • In-depth Knowledge of Unigraphics, Solidworks, Pro-Engineer, Moldflow software and Finite Element Analysis are highly regarded
  • Experience in sensitive material such as SAN, ABS, PP, PE, PS and etc.
  • Work involved designing packaging container and bottles molds  for the Packaging industries
  • Able to work independently
  • A good communicator is desired but not essential
  • Must be pro-active and able to meet deadline
  • Have good communication skills and can work within a team or individually  with minimum supervision
  • Excellent in operating Microsoft Office OS and manufacture machines (lathe, mill, CNC, EDM, welding etc)
  • Willing to learn, display fast learner skill and able to work under pressure
  • Fluent and able to communicate and written in English
  • Willing to Work in Surabaya

[Posisi Prioritas]
